DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare marginal bone level change ASTRA TECH Implant System ; Fixture ST Biomet 3i ; OsseotiteÂ® Implants . Subjects partial edentulism posterior maxilla and/or mandible include one-stage surgical protocol use . Implants load within 15 week installation . The subject follow 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Marginal Bone Loss Around Implants From Two Dental Implant Systems .
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent Age 18 75 year Partial edentulism , Kennedy class I II , last natural tooth must cuspid first bicuspid Edentulous area/s implant placement 2 month Untreated caries and/or periodontal disease residual dentition Need presurgical bone soft tissue augmentation plan implant area/s . Absence occlusal stability centric occlusion Any systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Systemic corticosteroid medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Pregnancy Present alcohol drug abuse Tobacco smoking last 6 month Unable unwilling return followup visit period 3 year
